name: Unown F
author: CR CG gangs
flavor_text: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

abilities.name: [Find]
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if you have Unown F, Unown I, Unown N, and Unown D on your Bench, you may search your deck for a Trainer card. Show that card to your opponent, then put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

rule_box: You may have up to 4 Basic Pokémon cards in your deck with Unown in their names.
